actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to provide that a Member of the Congress may not be paid annuity under the civil service retirement system for service as a Member if the Member has been convicted of violating while serving as a Member certain provisions relating to bribery, graft, and conflicts of interest.

summary.text: Prohibits the payment of an annuity under the civil service retirement system to a Member of Congress or a survivor or beneficiary of such Member if such Member has been convicted of bribery, graft, or conflicts of interest while serving as a Member.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to provide that a Member of the Congress may not be paid annuity under the civil service retirement system for service as a Member if the Member has been convicted of violating while serving as a Member certain provisions relating to bribery, graft, and conflicts of interest.
